faq.q1: What is Pixverse Image to Video?

faq.q2: How does Pixverse Image to Video work?
faq.a2: The system analyzes the image, predicts plausible motion, separates layers for depth, and renders frames with camera moves, lip-sync (if enabled), and VFX for a smooth video.
faq.a3: Clear subjects with defined edges‚Äîcharacter portraits, anime frames, manga/manhwa panels, product photos, and stylized illustrations‚Äîproduce the most stable animations.
faq.q4: Can I add lip-sync or facial animation?
faq.a4: Yes, add prompts for lip-sync, eye blinks, head turns, and expression changes to bring characters to life.
faq.a5: Common inputs like JPG and PNG are supported, and outputs are downloadable as MP4 for easy posting and editing.
